revised_title: Observations on Electricity and its Communication to Non-electrics
tldr: The author, Wm. Watson, discusses and analyzes the experiments and conclusions presented by Monsieur le Monnier regarding the communication of electric virtue to non-electrics. Watson disagrees with some of le Monnier's findings and provides alternative explanations for the results of the experiments, supporting the rule laid down by Monsieur du Fay.
